signature: static <U, T> BiFunctionStringLookup<U, T> on(final Map<String, T> map)
name: on
javadoc:
/**
 * Creates a function that looks up values in the given map.
 *
 * @param map the map to look up values from
 * @return a function that takes a key and a value of type U, and returns the corresponding value of type T from the map
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Creates a function that looks up values in the provided map.
 *
 * @param map the map to look up values from, where keys are of type String and values are of type T
 * @return a function that takes a key (of type String) and a value of type U, and returns the corresponding value of type T from the map
 */

signature: public String lookup(final String key, final P object)
name: lookup
javadoc:
/**
 * Looks up an object in this map using the provided key and object.
 *
 * @param key   the key to look up
 * @param object the object associated with the key
 * @return the value associated with the key, or null if no mapping of the key is found,
 *         or if a security exception, NullPointerException, or IllegalArgumentException occurs
 * @throws NullPointerException if the provided key or object is null
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Performs a functional-style lookup of an object in this map using the provided key and object.
 *
 * @param key   the key to look up
 * @param object the object associated with the key
 * @return      the value associated with the key, or null if no mapping of the key is found,
 *              or if a security exception, NullPointerException, or IllegalArgumentException occurs
 * @throws NullPointerException if the provided key or object is null
 */
